result.query:
query($table: String!
 $sysId: String!
 $views: String
 $query: String
 $workspaceConfigId: String
 $actionConfigId: String
 $ribbonConfigId: String
 $headerConfigId: String
 $highlightedValueConfigId: String
 $viewRuleConfigId: String
 $forcedViewName: String
 $position: String
 $preferences: [String]!
 $parentTable: String
 $parentRecordSysId: String
 $expandGlideVars: Boolean
 $actionLayoutId: String) {
		GlideRecordDomainQuery_Query {
			uiDomain(table: $table
 sysId: $sysId
 query: $query) {
				tableDisplayValue
				recordValues {
					name
					value
					displayValue
					valuesList {
						value
						displayValue
					}
				}
				domainElementData {
					dictionaryData {
						label
						name
						internalType
					}
					...on GlideRecordDomainQuery_ReferenceElementType {
						reference
						useReferenceQualifier
					}
				}
			}
		}
		GlideViewQuery_Query {
			uiView(table: $table
 views: $views
 sysId: $sysId
 workspaceConfigId: $workspaceConfigId
 query: $query
 viewRuleConfigId: $viewRuleConfigId
 forcedViewName: $forcedViewName
 parentTable: $parentTable
 parentRecordSysId: $parentRecordSysId) {
				view
				availableViews {
					name
					label
				}
				glideLayoutItem(table: $table
 sysId: $sysId
 query: $query
 parentTable: $parentTable
 parentRecordSysId: $parentRecordSysId
 workspaceConfigId: $workspaceConfigId
 highlightedValueConfigId: $highlightedValueConfigId
 expandGlideVars: $expandGlideVars) {
					encodedRecord
					_query {
						
headerConfig:GlideHeaderQuery_Query {
	headerItems(table: $table
 sysId: $sysId
 workspaceConfigId: $workspaceConfigId
 headerConfigId: $headerConfigId
 highlightedValueConfigId: $highlightedValueConfigId) {
		headerSysId
		recordDisplayValue
		tableDisplayValue
		hideTags
		primaryItem {
			fieldName
			fieldLabel
			displayValue
		}
		subheadingItem {
			fieldName
			fieldLabel
			displayValue
		}
		headerImageItem {
			fieldName
			fieldLabel
			headerImage
		}
		secondaryItems {
			fieldName
			fieldLabel
			displayValue
			highlightedValueStyle {
				field
				value
				status
				showIcon
				variantName
				colorName
				iconName
			}
			referenceItem {
				table
				sysId
			}
		}
	}
}


        GlideViewableTagQuery_Query {
            viewableRecordTags (table: $table
 sysId: $sysId
 parentTable: $parentTable
 parentRecordSysId: $parentRecordSysId) {
                canCreateGlobalTags
                enabled
                records {
                    name
                    canEdit
                    sysId
                    viewableBy
                    labelEntry
                }
            }
        }

GlideUxActionLayout_Query {
    getActionLayout(table: $table
 sysId: $sysId
 view: "$$parent.viewName$$"
 query: $query
 actionConfigId: $actionConfigId
 parentTable: $parentTable
 parentRecordSysId: $parentRecordSysId
 encodedRecord: "$$parent.encodedRecord$$"
 actionLayoutId: $actionLayoutId){
        messages {
            name
            value
        }
        actionLayoutItems {
            ... on  GlideUxActionLayout_UxActionGroupType {
                name
                label
                color
				icon
				animateIcon
                shouldBeInOverflow
                type
                actions        
                {
                    ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxUiActionType {
                        name
                        label
                        color
                        shouldBeInOverflow
                        order
                        sysId
                        clientScript
                        hint
                        hasClientScript
						itemName
                    }
                    ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxDeclarativeActionType {
                        name
                        label
                        color
                        shouldBeInOverflow
                        assignmentId
                        tooltip
                        actionPayload
                        actionDispatch
                        actionType
                        clientScript
                        confirmationMessage
                        confirmationRequired
                        scriptedClientCondition
                        modelConditions {
                            field
                            operator
                            value
                            newQuery
                            or
                        }
                        payloadMap {
                            name
                            value
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxUiActionType {
                name
                label
                color
				icon
                shouldBeInOverflow
                sysId
                clientScript
                hint
                hasClientScript
				icon
				animateIcon
				itemName
            }

            ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxDeclarativeActionType {
                name
                label
                color
				icon
				animateIcon
                shouldBeInOverflow
                assignmentId
                tooltip
                actionPayload
                actionDispatch
                actionType
                clientScript
                confirmationMessage
                confirmationRequired
                scriptedClientCondition
                modelConditions {
                    field
                    operator
                    value
                    newQuery
                    or
                }
                payloadMap {
                    name
                    value
                }
            }
        }
		actionLayoutId
    }
}

result.description: Retrieves information for the selected user.  Defaults to the currently logged in user.  Not exposed to UIB - only used within a composite broker.
result.script:
(function buildQuery(query, inputs) {
	// todo:  would be awesome to allow javascript: or gs API calls on broker parameters
    var userSysId = (inputs.userSysId || "").trim();
    if (gs.nil(userSysId))
        userSysId = gs.getUserID();

    var userQuery =
        "{\r\n" +
        "  GlideDomain_Query {\r\n" +
        "    userInfo(sys_id: \"" + userSysId + "\") {\r\n" +
        "      sys_id\r\n" +
        "      userName\r\n" +
        "      fullName\r\n" +
        "      avatar\r\n" +
        "      avatarPath\r\n" +
        "      initials\r\n" +
		"      timeZone\r\n" +			
        "      _query {\r\n" +
        "        GlideRecord_Query {\r\n" +
        "          sys_user_presence(queryConditions: \"user=$$parent.sysId$$\", pagination: {limit: 1}) {\r\n" +
        "            _results {\r\n" +
        "            	sys_id {\r\n" +
        "                	value\r\n" +
        "            	}\r\n" +
        "            	user {\r\n" +
        "            		value\r\n" +
        "            		displayValue\r\n" +
        "            	}\r\n" +
        "            	status {\r\n" +
        "            		value\r\n" +
        "            		displayValue\r\n" +
        "            	}\r\n" +
        "            	sys_updated_on {\r\n" +
        "            		value\r\n" +
        "            		displayValue\r\n" +
        "            	}\r\n" +
        "            }\r\n" +
        "          }\r\n" +
        "        }\r\n" +
        "      }\r\n" +
        "    }\r\n" +
        "  }\r\n" +
        "}";

    query.append(userQuery);
})(query, inputs);
result.name: GlideDomain User Query

result.query:
query ($cardId: String!, $fields: [String]) {
    GlideVisualBoard_Query {
      getCard(cardId: $cardId, fields: $fields) {
        thumbnail
        attachments {
          image_width: imageWidth
          image
          can_read: canRead
          src
          sys_id: sysId
          average_image_color: averageImageColor
          thumb_src: thumbSrc
          sys_created_on: sysCreatedOn
          size_compressed: sizeCompressed
          image_height: imageHeight
          table_name: tableName
          size_bytes: sizeBytes
          sys_created_by: sysCreatedBy
          table_sys_id: tableSysId
          file_name: fileName
          state
          content_type: contentType
        }
        swim_lane_id: swimLaneId
        sys_id: sysId
        sla {
          sla_name: slaName
          stage
          has_breached: hasBreached
          percentage
          planned_end_time: plannedEndTime
          task_id: taskId
        }
        checklist {
          owner
          document
          name
          can_delete: canDelete
          id
          items {
            name
            can_delete: canDelete
            id
            complete
            checklist_id: checklistId
            order
          }
          availableTaskTypes {
            value
            label
            reference
            missing
            image
            used
            raw_label: rawLabel
            selected
          }
          table
        }
        sys_updated_on: sysUpdatedOn {
          date_time: dateTime
        }
        labels_count: labelsCount
        due_date_display_value: dueDateDisplayValue
        all_sla: allSla {
          sla_name: slaName
          stage
          has_breached: hasBreached
          percentage
          planned_end_time: plannedEndTime
          task_id: taskId
        }
        labels {
          color
          active
          id
          value
          order
        }
        lane_id: laneId
        removed
        primary_key_field: primaryKeyField
        record {
          name
          value {
            ... on GlideVisualBoard_StringType {
              string
            }
            ... on GlideVisualBoard_BooleanType {
              boolean
            }
            ... on GlideVisualBoard_TaskFieldType {
              display_value: displayValue
              is_multi_text: isMultiText
              is_choice_table: isChoiceTable
              can_read: canRead
              name
              is_reference: isReference
              can_write: canWrite
              label
              max_length: maxLength
              value
            }
          }
        }
        board_id: boardId
        task_id: taskId
        order
      }
    }
  }

result.query:
query ($configurationId: String!, $listId: String, $allowSharing: Boolean, $tinyId: String) {
	GlideUxListMenuLayout_Query {
	  	getListMenuLayout(configurationId: $configurationId, listId: $listId, allowSharing: $allowSharing, tinyId: $tinyId) {
			listMenu {
				canUserAccessList,
				categoryItems {
				  	isExpanded
				  	displayValue
					selectionPath
				  	id
				  	label
				  	type
				  	children {
						...listMenuItem
				  	}
				}
				isListIdValid
				listOwner
				menuItems {
					...myListMenuItem
				}
				sharedMenuItems {
					...myListMenuItem
				}
				targetTablePrefix
				selectedListMenuItem {
					...listMenuItem
				}
			}
	  }
	}
}

fragment myListMenuItem on GlideUxListMenuLayout_ListMenuItemType {
	...listMenuItem
	sharedUsers
	sharedGroups
}
fragment listMenuItem on GlideUxListMenuLayout_ListMenuItemType {
	columns
	conditions
	view
	displayValue
	selectionPath
	id
	label
	order
	table
	targetTable
	groupByColumn
	fixedQuery
	limit
	maxColumns
	runHighlightedValuesQuery
	openedByLink
	createdOn
	featureFlags {
		...featureFlags
	}

	  
}
fragment featureFlags on GlideUxListMenuLayout_ListMenuItemFeatureFlagsType{
	hideHighlightedValues
	hideHeader
	hideListActions
	hideTitle
	hideRecordCountBadge
	hideLastRefreshedText
	hideRefreshButton
	hideMenuButton

	hideRowSelector
	hideColumnGrouping
	hideColumnResizing
	hideColumnFiltering
	hideColumnSorting
	hideDragAndDrop
	hideCellFilter
	hideInlineEditing
	hideHighlightContent
	highlightContent {
		patterns
		color
	}
	hideLinks
	overrideWordWrapUserPref
	wordWrap
	maxCharacters
	hideReferenceLinks
	hideEmptyStateImage
	hidePagination
	hidePages
	hideRange
	hideRowCount
	hidePreviousPage
	hideFirstPage
	hideLastPage
	hideNextPage
	hideRowsPerPageSelector
	hidePersonalization
}

result.script:
(function buildQuery(query, inputs) {
    skillConfigObj = JSON.parse(inputs.skillConfigObj);
    var varSets = skillConfigObj.skill_config_var_sets;
    const deliveryStepSysId = "select-delivery";
    var varSetSysIds = [];

    function fetchVarSetSysIds(varSets) {
        varSets.forEach((varSet) => {
            var varSetSysId = varSet.sysId || varSet.sys_id;
            if (varSetSysId && varSetSysId !== deliveryStepSysId) {
                varSetSysIds.push(varSetSysId);
                if (varSet.override_sets && varSet.override_sets.length > 0) {
                    fetchVarSetSysIds(varSet.override_sets);
                }
            }
        });
    }

    fetchVarSetSysIds(varSets);

    function getFormLayoutQueryData(sysId) {
        return "formLayout(\r\n" +
            "				table: \"sn_nowassist_skill_config_var_set\"\r\n" +
            "				view: \"now_assist_admin\"\r\n" +
            "				sysId: \"" + sysId + "\"\r\n" +
            "				expandGlideVars: true\r\n" +
            "				) {\r\n" +
            "				sysId\r\n" +
            "				recordValues {\r\n" +
            "					name\r\n" +
            "					value\r\n" +
            "					displayValue\r\n" +
            "					valuesList {\r\n" +
            "					value\r\n" +
            "					displayValue\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "				}\r\n" +
            "				elementsData {\r\n" +
            "					name: elementName\r\n" +
            "					dictionary: dictionaryData {\r\n" +
            "					type: dictionaryType\r\n" +
            "					dependentFieldLabel\r\n" +
            "					dependentField\r\n" +
            "					dependentTable\r\n" +
            "					name\r\n" +
            "					label\r\n" +
            "					fieldHint\r\n" +
            "					canWrite\r\n" +
            "					canRead\r\n" +
            "					canCreate\r\n" +
            "					internalType\r\n" +
            "					isMandatory\r\n" +
            "					isEncrypted\r\n" +
            "					encryptionContext\r\n" +
            "					sys_readonly: sysReadonly\r\n" +
            "					attributes {\r\n" +
            "						name\r\n" +
            "						value\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_TemplateElementType {\r\n" +
            "					dependentField\r\n" +
            "					dependentValue\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_ChoiceElementType {\r\n" +
            "					choices {\r\n" +
            "						displayValue\r\n" +
            "						value\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_ScriptElementType {\r\n" +
            "					isXMLView\r\n" +
            "					maxLength\r\n" +
            "					recordScope\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_FileAttachmentElementType {\r\n" +
            "					value\r\n" +
            "					displayValue\r\n" +
            "					state\r\n" +
            "					contentType\r\n" +
            "					canEditName\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_TableNameElementType {\r\n" +
            "					displayValue\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_ConditionBuilderElementType {\r\n" +
            "					dependentValue\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_FieldNameElementType {\r\n" +
            "					displayValue\r\n" +
            "					dependentFieldLabel\r\n" +
            "					dependentValue\r\n" +
            "					displayValueWithPath\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_FieldListElementType {\r\n" +
            "					dependentFieldLabel\r\n" +
            "					dependentValue\r\n" +
            "					displayValuesWithPath\r\n" +
            "					displayColumnLabel\r\n" +
            "					displayColumnValue\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_SlushBucketElementType {\r\n" +
            "					slushBucketFields {\r\n" +
            "						label\r\n" +
            "						value\r\n" +
            "						selected\r\n" +
            "						order\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_CurrencyElementType {\r\n" +
            "					value\r\n" +
            "					code\r\n" +
            "					defaultCurrency\r\n" +
            "					currencyCodes {\r\n" +
            "						code\r\n" +
            "						symbol\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_PhoneNumberElementType {\r\n" +
            "					value\r\n" +
            "					country\r\n" +
            "					countryCodes {\r\n" +
            "						code\r\n" +
            "						name\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_GlideListElementType {\r\n" +
            "					reference\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_DocumentIdElementType {\r\n" +
            "					documentLabel\r\n" +
            "					dependentValue\r\n" +
            "					}\r\n" +
            "					... on GlideLayout_ReferenceElementType {\r\n" +
            "					reference\r\n" +
            "					referenceQualifier\r\n" +
            "					referenceKey\r\n" +

    var glideLayoutQuery = "{\r\n" +

result.query:
query ($table: String!, $sysId: String!, $view: String, $actionLayoutId: String) {
  GlideUxActionLayout_Query {
    getActionLayout(
      table: $table
      sysId: $sysId
      view: $view
      actionLayoutId: $actionLayoutId
    ) {
      actionLayoutItems {
        ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxActionGroupType {
          name
          label
          color
          icon
          shouldBeInOverflow
          type
          actions {
            ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxUiActionType {
              name
              label
              color
              shouldBeInOverflow
              order
              sysId
              clientScript
              hint
              hasClientScript
              itemName
            }
            ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxDeclarativeActionType {
              name
              label
              color
              shouldBeInOverflow
              assignmentId
              tooltip
              actionPayload
              actionDispatch
              actionType
              clientScript
              confirmationMessage
              confirmationRequired
              scriptedClientCondition
              modelConditions {
                field
                operator
                value
                newQuery
                or
              }
              payloadMap {
                name
                value
              }
            }
          }
        }
        ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxUiActionType {
          name
          label
          color
          icon
          shouldBeInOverflow
          sysId
          clientScript
          hint
          hasClientScript
          icon
          itemName
        }
        ... on GlideUxActionLayout_UxDeclarativeActionType {
          name
          label
          color
          icon
          shouldBeInOverflow
          assignmentId
          tooltip
          actionPayload
          actionDispatch
          actionType
          clientScript
          confirmationMessage
          confirmationRequired
          scriptedClientCondition
          modelConditions {
            field
            operator
            value
            newQuery
            or
          }
          payloadMap {
            name
            value
          }
        }
      }
      actionLayoutId
    }
  }
}

query ($searchContextConfigId:String!, $searchTerm:String!, $facetFilters:String, $searchFilters:String, $sortOptions:String, $requestedFields:String, $disableSpellCheck: Boolean, $paginationToken: String, $locale:String,$additionalContext:String, $setSemanticSearch:Boolean, $forceSkipSignalsLogging: Boolean, $isDebug:Boolean, $searchEvamConfigId:String, $userContextOverrides:String, $searchPurview:String, $asyncParams:String, $semanticConfigurations:String, $additionalFilters:String, $vaEvamDefinitionId:String) {
  GlideSearch_Query {
    sortOptions(searchFilters: $searchFilters, searchContextConfigId: $searchContextConfigId) {
      label
      sysId
    }
    search(searchContextConfigId: $searchContextConfigId, searchTerm: $searchTerm, facetFilters:$facetFilters, searchFilters:$searchFilters, sortOptions:$sortOptions, paginationToken: $paginationToken, requestedFields: $requestedFields, disableSpellCheck: $disableSpellCheck, locale: $locale,additionalContext:$additionalContext, setSemanticSearch: $setSemanticSearch, forceSkipSignalsLogging: $forceSkipSignalsLogging, isDebug: $isDebug, searchEvamConfigId:$searchEvamConfigId, userContextOverrides: $userContextOverrides, searchPurview: $searchPurview, asyncParams: $asyncParams, semanticConfigurations: $semanticConfigurations, additionalFilters: $additionalFilters,vaEvamDefinitionId:$vaEvamDefinitionId) {
      term
      rewrittenTerm
      originalSearchPhrase
      spellCorrectedTerm
      previousPaginationToken
      nextPaginationToken
      currentPage
      filters {
        sysId
        label
        count
      }
      totalHits
      showResultCount
      selectedFilterIds
      selectedSortOptionIds
      appliedFacetFilters
      appliedFacetFiltersMetadata {
          facetFilter
          applied

      }
      count
      responseTimeInMs
      matchedQueryIntents
      matchedGeniusResultIntents
      matchedRules
      queryLanguage
      intentSwitch
      additionalContext
      asyncGeniusResultChannelName
      primarySearchRequestId
      awaitingResults
      pendingResultDetails {
        queryRewrite
        regularSearch
        geniusResults
      }
      callbackId
      queryDisambiguation {
        ambiguousQuery
        clarifyingQuestion
      }
      sensitivityFilter {
        hasMatch

        filterValue
      }

        message
      }
      queryAnalytics {
        totalTimeInMS
        preProcessingTimeInMS
        lateBindingTimeInMS
        totalGeniusResultTimeInMS
        totalEngineTimeInMS
      }
      searchAnalyticsPayload {
        logSignals
        userId
        sessionId
        searchContextConfigId
        queryTerm
        rewrittenQueryTerm
        searchResults {
          recordId
          tableName
          resultType
          cardType
          featureVector
          order
          grConfigId
          citations {
                    table
                    sysId
                    external
          }
       }
       searchResultsPerSource {
         sourceId
         numberOfResults
       }
       appliedFacetFilters
       appliedFilterIds
       appliedSortOptionId
       matchedQueryIntents
       responseTimeInMs
       hasSearchResults
       hasGeniusResults
       queryLanguage
       relevancyModelId
       numberOfQAGeniusResults
       numberOfPeopleGeniusResults
       numberOfCatalogGeniusResults
       geniusResultsDisplayed
       geniusResultsExecuted
       geniusResultClickRank
       synonyms
       stopWords
       queryMode
       spellCheckCorrectedTerm
       spellCheckEnabled
       fieldRestrictions
       semanticSearch
       userContext {
        userID
        userName
        roleIDs
        roleNames
        domainIDs
        domainNames
        country
        companyID
        companyName
        departmentID
        departmentName
        locationID
        homeOfficeID
        homeOfficeName
        homeOfficeCity
        homeOfficeState
        homeOfficeCountry
        latitude
        longitude
        language
        browserInfo
        browserType
        deviceType
        deviceForm
        deviceOS
        mobileDeviceType
        deviceVersion
        locationCityStateCountry
        departmentLevelList
      }
        queryEvaluationId
        queryEvaluationExecutionId
        queryEvaluationParameterIds
        queryEvaluationAppliedParameterValues
        generativeAiLogIds
     }
      searchResults {
        sysId
        aisDocId
        table
        recordClassName
        url
        tableLabelSingular
        tableLabelPlural
        score
        title
        text
        documentIndex
        semanticSimilarity
        semanticEmbedding
        primaryLanguage
        childDocs {
          sysId
          aisDocId
          table
          recordClassName
          url
          tableLabelSingular
          tableLabelPlural
          score
          title
          text
          documentIndex
          semanticSimilarity
          semanticEmbedding
          totalChildren
          columns {
            fieldName
            label
            value
            displayValue
          }
          passages {
            passageInfos {
              fieldName
              fieldValues
            }
          }
        }
        columns {
          fieldName
          label
          value
          displayValue
        }
        passages {
          passageInfos {
            fieldName
            fieldValues
          }
        }
      }
      searchFacets {
        type
        name
        order
        optionLimit
        facetConfigSysId
        data {
          count
          options {
            label
            value
            count
          }
        }
      }
      geniusResults {
        modelId
        data {
          fieldName
          value
          displayValue
        }
      }
      asyncGeniusResultsMaxWaitTime
    }
  }
}

result.description: Fetches the knowledge record details based on sys id
result.query:
query ($sys_id: String!, $ts_query_kb_id: String, $top_click_rank: String) {
  AppKnowledge_Query {
    getArticleDetails(articleID: $sys_id, searchId: $ts_query_kb_id, topClickRank: $top_click_rank) {
      articleHTML
      isEditable
      articleSysId
      infoMessage
      errorMessage
      templateFieldData {
        column
        content
        fieldStyle
        headingStyle
        label
        type
        collapsed
        collapsible
      }
      versionDetails {
      	isInstalled
        isEnabled
        history {
          sysClassName
          sysId
          versionLabel
          versionNumber
          versionText
        }
        showHistory
        versionDisplay
        versionDisplayLabel
        newVersionAvailable
        warningMessage
      }
      languageDetails {
        label
        sysId
        language
        selected
      }
      kbDocSysId
      showFeedbackOptions
      showStarRating
      showYNRating
      showFlag
      showFeedbackComments
      enableActionableFeedbackForRating
      enableActionableFeedbackForHelpful
      enableActionableFeedbackForFlag
      isKBAdmin
      isKBOwner
      commentsThreshold
      hasComments
      docviewerEnabled
      articleInfo {
				author
				displayAttachments
				kbCategory
				workflowState
				kbKnowledgeBase
				number
				shortDescription
				sysId
				sysUpdatedOn
				sysViewCount
				rating
				revisedBy
        baseVersion
        isExpired
        officeDocUrl
		sysClassName
      }
      totalUsefulCount
      usefulYesCount
    }
  }

  GlideDomain_Query {
    user {
      sys_id
      language
      avatar
      fullName
    }
  }
}

result.description: Prefetch Graphql for Agent Assist Search
result.query:
query(
    $tableConfig: String!,
    $hints: String,
    $formSysID: String,
    $formTable: String,
    $usePreferredResourceOnLoad: Boolean
) {
    GlideContextualSearch_Query (
    tableConfig: $tableConfig,
    formSysID: $formSysID,
    formTable: $formTable,
    hints: $hints,
    usePreferredResourceOnLoad: $usePreferredResourceOnLoad,
    query:"",
    context: "",
) {
    request {
        query {
            freetext
        }
        meta {
            window {
                start
                end
            }
        }
        context
        resources
        id
    }
    results {
        id,
        title,
        link,
        linkTarget,
        snippet,
        relatedLinks {
            link
            title
            spLink
        }
        ... on GlideContextualSearch_CatalogItemType {
            image {
                link
                thumbnail {
                    link
                }
            }
        }
        meta {
            score
            source
            interleaved
            card_icon
            card_label
            card_title
            additional_fields
            card_snippet
            card_show_footer
            detail_component_name
            detail_title
            detail_link
            detail_additional_fields
            detail_show_work_note
            ... on GlideContextualSearch_CatalogItemMetaType {
                description
            }
            ... on GlideContextualSearch_KnowledgeArticleMetaType {
                author
                link
                number
                published
                modified
                modified_display
                viewCount
            }
            ... on GlideContextualSearch_PinnedArticleMetaType {
                pinned
                author
                link
                number
                published
                modified
                modified_display
                viewCount
            }
            ... on GlideContextualSearch_SocialQAMetaType {
                author
                published
                modified
                modified_display
                viewCount
                answerCount
                votes
            }

            ... on GlideContextualSearch_CommunityBlogMetaType {
                forum
                views
                upvotes
                helpful
                likes
                rating
                modified
                modified_display
                full_view_url
                comments
            }

            ... on GlideContextualSearch_CommunityQuestionMetaType {
                forum
                views
                upvotes
                helpful
                likes
                rating
                modified
                modified_display
                full_view_url
                comments
            }

            ... on GlideContextualSearch_CommunityAnswerMetaType {
                forum
                views
                upvotes
                helpful
                likes
                rating
                modified
                modified_display
                full_view_url
                comments
            }

            ... on GlideContextualSearch_GlideResourceSearchMetaType {
                table_name
                resource_details
                description
            }

            ... on GlideContextualSearch_ScriptResourceSearchMetaType {
                confidence
                resource_details
                table_name
                recommendation_type
                recommendation_title
                recommendation_message
                recommendation_action
                recommendation_result
                recommendation_common_field
            }
        }
    }
    meta {
        has_more_results
        returned_results
        recorded_actions {
          relevance
          search_term
          relevant_doc_table
          relevant_doc
        }
    }
}
}
